# Ignore the following folders (Unity's generated files)
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Visual Studio / MonoDevelop
.vscode/
.vs/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd

# Unity auto-generated files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb

# Unity 3D Generated File On Crash Reports
sysinfo.txt

# User settings
UserSettings/

# Other files
*.apk
*.aab
*.idb

# Ignore crash reports, log files, and other unwanted files
CrashReports/
*.stacktrace

# OS-specific files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
